entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
